data.title: The O.C.
data.text:
Orange County, California was never the same after Ryan Atwood (Benjamin McKenzie) came to town at the beginning of The O.C.s first season. From the moment this juvenile delinquent from Chino was taken in by the Cohen family, the socialite community of Newport Beach was turned upside down. Ryan quickly became the first friend that comic book geek Seth Cohen (Adam Brody) had ever had, and his bad boy charm attracted much attention-he drew the affections of popular Summer Roberts (Rachel Bilson) and he was criticized by Newport moms all around, particularly Julie Cooper (Melinda Clarke). Unfortunately for Julie, her daughter Marissa (Mischa Barton) didnt share her views on the new boy in town. Thus the stage is set for (to date) four seasons of humor, love, betrayal, school, secrets, divorce, marriage, scandal, and death. The series follows Ryan Atwood, who always seems to be in a fight, Marissa Cooper, who always manages to find a way to get herself into trouble, Summer Roberts, who seems like a ditz on the exterior but actually has a lot to contribute, Seth Cohen, a nerd with a sense of humor, Sandy Cohen, his lawyer father, Kirsten Cohen, his hard-working wife, Julie Cooper, a greedy socialite, and Jimmy Cooper, her embezzling husband. O.C. Highlights

Season 1: Ryan comes to Newport and moves in with the Cohens; Marissa dumps Luke for Ryan; Jimmy Cooper is charged with fraud and is divorced by Julie; Seth has to choose between new interest Anna and longtime girl of his dreams Summer; Marissa attracts a psychotic obsession; Julie marries Kirstens rich father Caleb; Ryan gets his old girlfriend pregnant and leaves Marissa, the Cohens, and Newport; Seth runs away from home

Season 2: Ryan and Seth both come home; Marissa and Summer both have new boyfriends; Caleb has a hidden daughter named Lindsay who Ryan starts dating; Seth gets a job and dates his boss Alex; Ryan's brother Trey comes to town; Seth, Summer, and new boyfriend Zach start a comic book; Lindsay leaves town; Seth and Summer/Ryan and Marissa get back together; Caleb dies; Kirsten goes into rehab for alcoholism; Trey tries to rape Marissa; Jimmy and Julie get back together; Ryan and Trey get into a fight and Marissa shoots Trey

Season 3: Jimmy is blackmailed into leaving town; Marissa is expelled from school and has to go to public school; a girl named Taylor tries to break up Seth and Summer; Marissa's little sister Kaitlin returns home from boarding school; Marissa's new friend Johnny falls in love with her and ends up falling off a cliff to his death; Marissa feels guilty and breaks up with Ryan; Julie gets engaged to Summer's father; Marissa and Ryan get accepted to UCLA; Summer gets accepted to Brown but Seth doesn't and he lies about it; Marissa dates Volchok but things go bad and in anger he rams Ryan's car off a cliff, killing Marissa

Season 4: Tune in to Fox Thursdays at 9 to find out!
